name: Newspaper Games
description:
Sit down with a cup of coffee as you open up your newspaper and play some games. 

In Newspaper Games you will find Sudoku, Word search, and Crossword puzzles just like in a newspaper. 

Gameplay:

  • 3 Fun Puzzle games
  • 4 Difficulty options
  • Randomly generated Sudoku, Word Searches, and Crossword puzzles adapted for difficulty

So go ahead, sit down, enjoy the coffee shop music, and have some fun while you enjoy your coffee.
